abstract: Editorial contends there has never been a better time to be a slightly faded writer just beyond cusp of copyright; says voluminous works, not easily found in libraries, are available in digital formats; welcomes goal of digitizing everything in public domain.
snippet: Millions of books that are in the public domain are available in digital formats, with wonderful surprises, like the World War I reporting of Philip Gibbs.
lead_paragraph: Millions of books that are in the public domain are available in digital formats, with wonderful surprises, like the World War I reporting of Philip Gibbs.

headline.main: Curious Contents of the Digital Library
headline.print_headline: Curious Contents of the Digital Library
headline.seo: Curious Contents of the Digital Library
